title: Emergency: Tsunami (Usefulness 6)
description: Traveler usefulness 6/10 phrases for the Tsunami subcategory within Emergency. Includes 1 card(s).

cards.english: There's no threat of a tsunami resulting from this earthquake.
cards.romaji: Kono jishin ni yoru tsunami no shinpai wa arimasen.
cards.japanese: この地震による津波の心配はありません。
